CustomField.description: External status of this advisor term (the version that is viewed by the advisor)
CustomField.formula: IF (CONTAINS(Status__c, " "), TRIM(RIGHT(Status__c, LEN(Status__c) - FIND(" ", Status__c))), Status__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External status of this advisor term (the version that is viewed by the advisor)
CustomField.label: Status external
